edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.queries
Class RequirementStatusDisplay

java.lang.Object
  edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.queries.RequirementStatusDisplay

public class RequirementStatusDisplay
extends java.lang.Object

The Requirement Status Display shows a list of requirements with a particular status value (violated, addressed, etc.) and the alternatives that have that relationship with them. This is based on the TableViewer example from an Eclipse Corner article. More information on the example can be found in the JavaDoc for the RationaleTaskList.
